page.title: 09HEALTH CARE continued
page.content: {SHANGTON CARE VILLAGE contd.} quaterly publication 'CARE NEWS', is printed by Shangton villagers. {KIBWORTH HALL This is a large old house on the Carlton road just outside Kibworth Harcourt, which used to be a private residence and then a school. It is now a hospital for the mentally handicapped. The house once belonged to the Bellville family until they moved away from Leicestershire, and in 1958 it was taken over by the Hospital Management Committee and now has over 30 patients between the ages of 18 and 72. Its policy is to encourage patients to venture out into the world through things like shopping trips and social events.
